class.name: ResourceFormatLoaderWhisperModel
class.brief_description: Loads Whisper model binaries (.bin) as [WhisperModel] resources.
class.description: A custom [ResourceFormatLoader] that allows Godot to recognize and load [code].bin[/code] files containing Whisper AI model weights as [WhisperModel] resources. This allows whisper models to be assigned directly in the editor inspector and loaded automatically by the engine.
